body_html: @lukaszkaiser you say that the training data should be huge. I tried with 10M sentences for English to French Translation. I see that the results are not good. I even tried to use AdagradOptimizer optimizer in place of GradientDescentOptimizer in seq2seq_model.py. The perplexity of the first two buckets is below 10 for checkpoints after 15000. Can you tell me if this is a good behavior? Also at what point or at what value of perplexity will the training stop gracefully?

body: @lukaszkaiser you say that the training data should be huge. I tried with 10M sentences for English to French Translation. I see that the results are not good. I even tried to use AdagradOptimizer optimizer in place of GradientDescentOptimizer  in seq2seq_model.py. The perplexity of the first two buckets is below 10 for checkpoints after 15000.  Can you tell me if this is a good behavior?  Also at what point or at what value of perplexity will the training stop gracefully?
